EmailTemplate.description: STANLIB Manco Corporate Cash auto-response template
EmailTemplate.name: STANLIB Corporate Cash
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created - STANLIB Corporate Cash
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Adviser,
Thank you for contacting STANLIB Corporate Cash.
This is an automatic acknowledgement that we have received your email. We will respond to you within 24 hours.
Kind Regards, STANLIB Corporate Cash
{!Case.Email_Thread}
